titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make residents of Puerto Rico eligible for the refundable portion of the child tax credit.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make residents of Puerto Rico eligible for the refundable portion of the child tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make residents of Puerto Rico eligible for the refundable portion of the child tax credit.
